entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
